definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: THERE are many theories that try to explain how allergies develop.
sentences.chinese: 有很多理論試圖解釋超敏反應的發生。

sentences.english: Drug-induced hypersensitivity syndrome (DIHS) is a severe drug eruption with characteristic symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 藥物超敏反應綜合徵是一種具有特異徵候的重症藥疹。
